sourcesContent: function t(){return t=>t.addInitializer((t=>new s(t)))}class s{constructor(t){this.host=t,this.host.addController(this)}hostConnected(){(this.host.hasAttribute("aria-controls")||this.host.ariaControls)&&(this.host.ariaHasPopup="true",this.host.ariaExpanded="false")}}export{s as AriaPopupTriggerController,t as ariaPopupTrigger};
